Dijkstra Note

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef struct Node {
 int i;
 int j;
 int dis;
 bool operator<(const Node& a) const {
 return a.dis < dis;
 }
} node;

int ta, N, M; // taskAmount
int maze[1000][1000];
int dis[1000][1000];
bool flag[1000][1000];
int mv[4][2] = {{1, 0}, {0, 1}, {-1, 0}, {0, -1}};
priority_queue<node> dispq;

void dijsktra() {
 while (!dispq.empty()) {
 flag[dispq.top().i][dispq.top().j] = true;
 for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
 node nn; //nextNode
 nn.i = dispq.top().i + mv[k][0];
 nn.j = dispq.top().j + mv[k][1];
 nn.dis = dis[nn.i][nn.j];
 if ((nn.i < N && nn.i >= 0) && (nn.j < M && nn.j >= 0) && (!flag[nn.i][nn.j])) {
 if (dispq.top().dis + maze[nn.i][nn.j] < nn.dis) {
 nn.dis = dispq.top().dis + maze[nn.i][nn.j];
 dispq.push(nn);
 dis[nn.i][nn.j] = nn.dis;
 }
 }
 }
 dispq.pop();
 }
}

int main() {
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
 cin.tie(nullptr);
 cin >> ta;
 while (ta--) {
 //int p[1000][1000];
 cin >> N >> M;
 for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
 for (int j = 0; j < M; j++) {
 cin >> maze[i][j];
 flag[i][j] = 0;
 dis[i][j] = 9999999;
 }
 }
 node n = {0, 0, maze[0][0]};
 dis[0][0] = maze[0][0];
 dispq.push(n);

 dijsktra();
 cout << dis[N - 1][M - 1] << '\n';
 }
}
